name: py-nipype
description: Neuroimaging in Python: Pipelines and Interfaces.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-nibabel
dependencies.description: Access a multitude of neuroimaging data formats

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-prov
dependencies.description:
A Python library for W3C Provenance Data Model (PROV). A library for W3C
Provenance Data Model supporting PROV-JSON, PROV-XML and PROV-O (RDF)

dependencies.name: py-pydot
dependencies.description: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language

dependencies.name: py-pydotplus
dependencies.description: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-rdflib
dependencies.description:
RDFLib is a pure Python package for working with RDF. RDFLib contains
most things you need to work with RDF, including: parsers and
serializers for RDF/XML, N3, NTriples, N-Quads, Turtle, TriX, Trig and
JSON-LD (via a plugin). a Graph interface which can be backed by any one
of a number of Store implementations store implementations for in-memory
storage and persistent storage on top of the Berkeley DB a SPARQL 1.1
implementation - supporting SPARQL 1.1 Queries and Update statements

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-simplejson
dependencies.description: Simplejson is a simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python

dependencies.name: py-filelock
dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependencies.name: py-etelemetry
dependencies.description: A lightweight python client to communicate with the etelemetry server

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows
dependent_to.description: Common workflows for MRI (anatomical, functional, diffusion, etc)
